name: Prinbiz
description: Key features  *Fast printing, seamless experience *Secure WiFi connection *Supports multiple photo sources (smartphone camera, smartphone album, memory card) *Supports ID photo printing and editing (biometric lines, filters and color adjustments) *Supports photo editing (borders, filters, photo and color adjustments) *Supports English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Spanish  *Glossy and matte surface options *Supports multiple photo selection *Supports Android 4.0.3 and above *Supports HiTi photo printers P520L, P750L, P310W, P530D, P525L *Supports Ad-hoc Mode and Infra Mode *Supports printer firmware update *More features coming soon!
